item.description:
Mark your calendars now for our February 8th dinner at Apollo Grill in Easthampton. We enjoyed a wonderful gathering at Apollo last year and are happy to be returning for more great food and interesting company. This is a low-key way to get to know WBOA Members outside our regular meetings. Please feel free to bring a friend or colleague.

Our three-course dinner will include a fresh green salad, choice of entrees and a delicious dessert. Total price including tax and tip will be $26. Cash bar. Informal networking begins at 5:30, dinner at 6:30.

Choice of salad:

Mixed Greens with Julienne Vegetables

Caesar Salad

Spinach Salad



Choice of entree:

Curry Coconut Stew with Peanuts, Cilantro and Apricot Chutney

Pistachio-crusted Salmon with Mango Hollandaise, Napa Slaw and Purple Sticky Rice

Grilled Pork Tenderloin with Cider Glaze, Braised Red Cabbage with Bacon and Mustard Mashed Potatoes

Pan Roasted Chicken with Prosciutto, Roasted Red Pepper and Fontina Cheese, Warm Spinach Salad and Artichoke Risotto Cake



Choice of dessert:

Chocolate Hazelnut Mousse

Apple Wontons with Vanilla Ice Cream


Please respond with your choice of salad, entree, and dessert.
item.name: February Evening Social Event- Apollo Grill
